reviews.text: The place looks ok, me and my bf had 2 omelette premiata (they put too many mushrooms in it) the greek salad was good the fries where loaded with oil very disgusting and we had mozzarella sticks those were good. They have a 18% gratuity included which was not cool at all.
Great restaurant awesome food I loved it. My friend showed me the place and I came back again with my wife and had an awesome time. Will be back soon
Food was amazing whenever I‚Äôm in the area I know where I‚Äôll be coming
Excellent meal! Enjoyed the bruschetta, the rockfish tempura, French onion soup, handmade pasta, New York cheesecake, and beignets.
Great food and great vibe !
Delicious food and great service!
Great pizza. The dough is light and airy. Great service from Monika.
Best food and service! Our waiter monika was the best!!
Great food!
Very lovely team, food very delicious
Delicious food!!! Great service as well. This is a great elevated kosher dairy spot!

Came here to say how much i enjoyed this place from uniqueness and exquisite taste in the most simplest things.
Service was great. Cant wait to go back and try the rest of the menu.
Great food
We had an amazing lunch here. Definitely get the rockfish. Moniqua was our waitress. Great experience overall.
Beautiful restaurant, great food, amazing ambience, and very nice and professional staff.

The food was delicious and quickly served. Monika the server was the best I have ever had in a restaurant! She was incredible!! We will be back!
Great food! Great staff! Great service!!!

Great dinner with great service.
Food was amazing would definitely recommend Javier is the best!
Javier was an amazing waiter, food was delicious. Will be coming back here

Came here to celebrate my friend‚Äôs birthday! Could not have been more happy with this choice of restaurant. Beautiful interior. Music was at a good volume where I was able to hear my friend speak. Waiters were attentive and polite. Salad was one of the freshest salads I have had at a restaurant. Overall food and experience was amazing. Would definitely come again!
I had an amazing time at caf√© premiata. I had a blast with my family. My kids loved it. The vibe was just so good. I highly recommend.

I had an amazing experience at Caf√©  premiata. The vibe was just amazing music amazing everything about it. Amazing food amazing I just can‚Äôt stop thinking about . I highly recommend This is a must try
This cafe is one of the best in Queens NY! The servers are amazing and the food is absolutely mouthwatering. I went to celebrate a birthday and I couldn‚Äôt have been happier. Highly recommend!!

The place is nice and wasn‚Äôt too crowded at the time I visited. The waitstaff was helpful and friendly. The food was tasty and fresh. The Caesar salad was really good and so were the beignets. Parking was easy to find and it was a very enjoyable experience.

I came from Italy and i was in Queens, looked for a place to have a dinner and it was a destiny! Great service and delicious food.. highly recommended! I felt like I'm in Italy, try it out, outstanding service and amazing menu!!
We had an awesome time here!! Monika was so nice. It was packed but they brought out the (DELICIOUS!) food super quickly!! Would give ten stars if I could.

This one hits home! Even with a reservation, expect a bit of a wait ‚Äî but it‚Äôs well worth it. The interior design is absolutely stunning, giving the whole place a high-end yet cozy vibe. The food was excellent, and it‚Äôs definitely in the running for the best caf√© on Main Street.
Service was quick, despite the crowd, and the food was delicious! We will definitely come back soon.
Always a treat coming here!
Food was delicious and service was very prompt!
Food was great. Vibes were great. Service was amazing. 10/10 recomened
GREAT!!
Food is great time and time again!
Food was great!

Absolutely incredible experience! The food was delicious, the staff was kind and super quick, and the whole place had such a chill, welcoming vibe. Definitely one of the best dairy spots I‚Äôve been to, highly recommend!
Fantastic service, delectable food and drinks. The atmosphere was welcoming, and the ambiance gave a uniquely pleasant experience. Highly recommended.
Monika was the best waitress! She was attentive, warm, and kind. The food was DELICIOUS. My favorite spot for sure! The bronzini was incredible.
BEST service! Delicious food! Gorgeous atmosphere! Love this place!!! Highly recommend ü§©
Simply the best place ever . Excellent food , amazing service  and  absolutely a very welcoming ambiance.  I love it.

Everything about this place was amazing! The appetizers were fresh and delicious! We had 3 pasta dishes, and they were amazing.  The alfredo sauce was one of the best I have ever tasted. The cinnamon roll was also one of the best that I have ever tasted.  I will definitely be going back!

At 5:30 or 6:00 pm restaurants on Main Street were still closed on a Monday afternoon . We were glad to see this place open walked in and was greeted warmly. Tables were still empty with one or two customers but that was the best thing quite calm and satisfying super . My first time and hope to go back. It somehow   too pricy , $40.00 for  a cut of Salmon or $25.00 for a dish of pasta  But we enjoyed it very much or maybe we were hungry after a day of graduation ceremonies. Well worth it in comparison to service of other restaurants in the same neighborhood hopefully see you soon . The food was very delicious.the only disappointment they don‚Äôt or didn‚Äôt serve us any bread or butter as if the forgot?

Ich mag es einfach nicht, wenn das Trinkgeld automatisch mit 20 % berechnet wird und au√üerdem wollte sie uns beim bezahlen √ºbers Ohr ziehen mit einer ganz anderen Rechnung. Das Essen und der Service waren eigentlich okay aber nichts besonderes. Das Ambiente ebenfalls nicht sehr einladend und Preise daf√ºr hoch.

The decor for this restaurant was excellent! Walking in felt like walking into a fancy hipster garden. Greenery + modern art + soft, yet beating music came together to create a cool atmosphere and vibe. The service was excellent. The food was phenomenal. Here are some pictures of what we got:

This place was not good at all!  The French onion soup was TERRIBLE!  It was the worst I ever had in my life!  The broth tasted disgusting, and they put a low quality nasty tasting mozzarella cheese on top!  In the soup were old and hard‚Ä¶

This Restaurant is AMAZING!!! The food, the drinks & the service was fantastic. The homemade cinnamon bun was out of this world!!! Definitely coming back!!!
Just went back again and got Sushi with Gold Flakes!!! It was amazing!! The Black Truffle Fettuccine Alfredo was great! And the rockfish is a must have!

Loved everything about this place! Pleasant decor and seating. Waitress was so sweet and knowledgeable (all staff in general)! All of the dishes we had were delicious. The cauliflower side dish really stood out and was amazing! Definitely get dessert!
The food was so so good and delicious . Such a great vibes !!!

The service is on top, atmosphere is nice and relaxing, background music is thoughtfully on low volume so you can easily enjoy a conversation with your date.
The place is very clean and all the details are in place.

Of course, the main part is their dishes! We enjoyed our meal very much. The salmon was so amazing, juicy, with a bit of a grilled tones.
As a big fan of Greek salad, I personally was more than satisfied.

Great job on the opening. Keep up with the  excellent work!

I would give this place a 4.5 out of 5!

My wife and I went for our 6 month anniversary.

The ambiance and place was beautiful! So fun and lively!
We ordered:

1) Porcini Arancini = It was absolutely delicious and flavorful! My favorite! Mushroom, risotto and truffle. The best Trio combination you can get!
2) Arugula and Baked Feta =  Everything paired really well together! The feta went well with the pear. Never saw that going together but pleasantly surprised. Only thing I would say is the plating could be better. You can make it a lot nicer with the baked feta and pears than laying it on the side of the salad.

3) Shoshito Peppers = As my wife says every time I bring them up she says "Yummy". It was also a lot of fun. My wife hates spicy foods and I love spicy! We both would eat one and see who ate a spicy one.

Then we go to the main course!

4) Wild Halibut = When we got this dish, the halibut was tasty mouthwatering! When I cut into the fish you can see a beautiful and glistening white inside! However, I would have rested the peppers on top rather than have it hiding under the fish.

5) Wild Mushroom Pappardelle = Small serving size but tasteful! The plating of the pasta was very nice! I do feel there was something missing that can really bring out this dish to its potential. But they most certainly did not skip on the mushroom portions!!

6) We had to get there dessert special which was the cinnamon roll. WOW! I mean... WOW! It was Incredible! I tried stopping myself from eating it as I am on a diet, but we finished the whole thing. It was sweet and savory. The nuts on top are a great addition! WOW!

7) tiramisu cake = Was not a fan of it. I did not understand why they put Cherries on top of it. I also did not like how it was in a dish. The whip cream was dense and the cake itself was bitter. When we brought it to the managers attention he was very nice and was open to feedback.

The Waitresses there were so nice and always looking our way to see if we ever needed anything. They Recommended really good food as you can see! They were never rude and always polite!

Overall my wife an I had an amazing time at Cafe Premiata! We will most definitely be coming back!

I can‚Äôt wait to go back and try everything else! I had a tempura sushi and everything you see in the pictures. EVERYTHING WAS 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è out of 5!  I specially loved the vibe of this place there is something for everyone.
Our group couldn‚Äôt get over how delicious everything we got was, from the pasta to the fish to the desserts. Everything was so flavorful and fresh. Excellent service. Highly recommend!

If your looking for a Kosher high end restaurant in Queens look no more!!!! This Gem üíé is on Main Street in Flushing Queens. This is the ü¶Ñ of a Good Kosher Restaurant! ‚≠êÔ∏è Cafe Premiata ‚≠êÔ∏è Delicious food, Beautiful ambience, Great service 5+++ ‚≠êÔ∏è  I Highly recommend this place and definitely will be coming back!!!

Excellent food great service Anatole has done a wonderful job. The pappardelle were unbelievable. Tuna tartare awesome. Nice twist on the Caesar salad delicious dressing. D√©core + ambiance.

Update:
Went back again
Mushroom Pizza amazing!!
Bronzino fresh and fantastic!
Greek salad was extremely tasty!!
The food was amazing. The service was quick, and the vibes were good. The linguine cream of mushroom was delicious! Can't wait to come back.

5 stars is too low for this restaurant.

It doesn't matter what you'll order on the menu. The food is outstanding!

I know nothing about food, but when you taste the salmon for example, you just know it's made to perfection.

The desert too is on another level. I had the tiramisu and ever bite was like the first "just yum!"

Next time your in Flushing make sure to try  Premiata

Such a vibey and cool place. The vibe and atmosphere was so nice. Great night out option and the perfect place for a birthday night outüéâ that was the highlight
of the night! and the food was delicious üòã
Every dish we tried was delightful. The sushi was fresh and flavorful. The pasta was cooked to perfection and the sauce was creamy. The service was incredible. The vibes were immaculate!

Would highly recommend to anyone in the area and beyond. We had Greek salad, Premiata pizza, pan roasted salmon, and tiramisu. Everything was super tasty and fresh. Grateful for the hospitality of the host and his team - they were efficient, accommodating, and welcoming.  Will surely be back there again.

I dream with traveling to NY and eating @Cafe Premiata. The food is beyond fresh, creative and delicious. Our favorite waitress, M√≥nica, is the sweetest and most professional server.
Wish I could visit Caf√© Premiata more often üíï
